basics.name: Tianhao Gu
basics.label: Software Developer, AI Engineer, Data Analyst

work.name: AUDI AG
work.summary: Internship focused on digitalization of international supply chain processes, supporting IT projects and process optimization across global production sites in China, India, and Mexico.
highlights: Collaborate in requirements management with Supply Chain International departments
Develop own Low Code applications for process automation and optimization
Design and implement ETL processes and create comprehensive dashboards for data visualization
Lead and support IT projects from both Audi brand and corporate IT perspective
Create documentation and presentations for decision-making committees
Conduct economic efficiency analyses and ROI assessments for digital transformation initiatives
Work in international environment optimizing logistics processes across global production sites

work.name: TUfast Racing Team
work.summary: Leading autonomous vehicle development with focus on enhanced control systems and safety protocols.
highlights: Led a 3-member subteam to develop and integrate enhanced PID and Pure Pursuit controllers atop the old classic Stanley controller
Optimized trajectory tracking algorithms and reducing latency by 60%, during dynamic laps and obstacle avoidance simulations

Refactored the old autonomous driving codebase on GitLab for modularity and maintainability; cleaned up legacy logic, adjusted SLAM hyperparameters, and wrote detailed technical documentation using YouTrack to streamline onboarding and future development
Replaced the legacy C++ simulator with the CARLA simulator in Python to enable more complex, diverse, and realistic test scenarios

Collaborated with mapping and perception teams to ensure seamless ROS node integration for sensor fusion, SLAM-based localization, and planning, and successfully solved control-related failures observed during the FSG 2024 competition

work.name: LingTu.de Edutech
work.summary: Co-founded an educational technology startup focused on innovative learning solutions, combining AI-driven personalization with modern pedagogical approaches.
highlights: Developed AI-powered personalized learning platform for language and mathematics education
Led product development from concept to market-ready solution with comprehensive curriculum design
Helped over 70 learners achieve their goals and generated over 10,000 euros in annual revenue with over 10 employers

work.name: TRUST Promotion
work.summary: Part-time IT support specialist providing technical services for major trade fairs and promotional events.
highlights: Provided comprehensive IT support and technical assistance for large-scale international trade shows
Managed event logistics and visitor coordination for ISPO Munich sports trade fair
Supported Drinktec international beverage and liquid food technology trade fair operations
Gained extensive experience in large-scale international trade show management and operations

work.name: go asia Deutschland GmbH
work.summary: Part-time logistics assistant and controlling specialist at Asian grocery retail store.
highlights: Managed inventory control and logistics coordination for retail operations
Assisted with financial controlling and administrative processes
Coordinated supply chain operations and vendor relationships
Supported warehouse management and product distribution
Handled data analysis and reporting for retail performance metrics

social_activities.name: International Companions for Learning (ICL) Program
social_activities.summary: Cross-cultural exchange program fostering connections between international students and Taiwanese elementary students through weekly online interactions and cultural activities.
highlights: Partnered with French university student to conduct 9 weekly video sessions with Taiwanese elementary students
Facilitated language exchange enhancing students' English proficiency while deepening understanding of Taiwanese culture
Participated in in-person 'Meet and Greet' events, visiting schools and engaging directly with students
Improved intercultural communication skills and gained valuable teaching and leadership experience
Contributed to international cooperation and educational exchange initiatives supported by Taiwan's Ministry of Education

social_activities.name: UEFA EURO 2024
social_activities.summary: Provided technical support and information services during Europe's largest sporting event.
highlights: Managed IT infrastructure and technical support for international visitors
Provided multilingual information services and technical assistance
Coordinated with international teams to ensure smooth event operations

social_activities.name: Chinese Students and Scholars Association Garching
social_activities.summary: Managed external relations and community outreach for Chinese students and scholars at TUM Garching campus.
highlights: Coordinated external partnerships and collaboration opportunities
Organized cultural exchange events and networking activities
Facilitated communication between Chinese student community and German institutions
Supported new student integration and community building initiatives

courses: 4.0 GPA in Machine Learning Modules: Linear Algebra, Discrete Math, Mathematical Analysis, Probability & Statistics

projects.name: Effectiveness of Search-Based Testing on a Deep Reinforcement-Learned Controller
projects.description: Research project evaluating metaheuristic search algorithms for robustness testing in decentralized DRL-based control systems.
highlights: Conducted the first empirical evaluation of metaheuristic search algorithms (e.g., genetic algorithms) for robustness testing in decentralized DRL-based control systems, achieving over 500% improvement in efficiency compared to traditional random testing

Investigated decentralized DRL for controlling drone swarms in complex environments, addressing scalability limits of centralized control, and analyzing the use of DRL techniques using OpenAI's Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithm

Collaborated with a research group at the University of Southern California to integrate their decentralized drone controller into the OpenSBT testing framework developed by our chair, enabling structured evaluation and reproducibility of their research results

projects.name: Unbiased Browsing Engine with Generative AI
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered search engine to mitigate ideological bias in search results using large language models.
highlights: Led a 3-member team to develop an unbiased web search engine powered by large language models, focusing on identifying and mitigating ideological bias in AI-generated content

Designed and tested filtering and re-ranking mechanisms through prompt engineering and data preprocessing, ensuring more balanced responses on politically sensitive and gender-related topics, and enhancing the fairness and pluralism of generative AI in search scenarios

projects.name: Full Stack Flight Search Engine
projects.description: Built a comprehensive flight search platform using modern web technologies and microservices architecture.
highlights: Led a 5-member team in building a full-stack flight search engine using Agile development methodologies, including SCRUM, Use Case Graphs, OOP Class Diagrams, and Patterns like Abstract Factory, applying principles learned in software engineering coursework

Developed a responsive frontend with React, HTML, and CSS, and a robust backend with Java and Spring Boot; integrated Lufthansa's official API to provide real-time flight data and search functionality
